--- DateTime: 2022/1/10 11:01
---
BattleMathUtils = {}

--- 向量 围绕 Y 轴 旋转 一定角度
function BattleMathUtils.AngleAxis_Y_V3(oriVec,angle)
   local x = oriVec.x
   local z = oriVec.z
    local x1 = x *  math.acos(angle) + z * math.asin(angle)
    local z1 = -x *  math.asin(angle) + z * math.acos(angle)
    return Vector3(x1,0,z1)
end

--- 向量 围绕 Y 轴 旋转 一定角度
function BattleMathUtils.AngleAxis_Y_V2(oriVec,angle)
    local x = oriVec.x
    local y = oriVec.y
    local x1 = x *  math.acos(angle) + y * math.asin(angle)
    local y1 = -x *  math.asin(angle) + y * math.acos(angle)
    return Vector2(x1,y1)
end
return BattleMathUtils
